tr.td:
Normal: Well developed, Well nourished, No apparent distress, No HTN (<139/<89), No significant change in BP, Normal affect
Abormal: Cachectic, Lethargic, Unresponsive

Normal: No lesions, No pallor, No ecchymoses, No nodules, No ulcers
Abormal: Rash, Diaphoresis, Poor skin turgor

Normal: White sclera, PERRLA, EOMI
Abormal: Icteric, Conjuntiva abnormal, Pupils unequal

Normal: Sinuses non-tender, Nasal mucosa intact, No thrush, Hearing normal, External ears normal, Neck supple & non-tender, Normal teeth, lips, gums, Clear oropharynx
Abormal: TM perforated, Erythema of pharynx, Oral lesions

Normal: No supraclavicular lymphadenopathy
Abormal: Cervical lymphadenopathy, Axillary lymphadenopathy, Inguinal lymphadenopathy

Normal: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, No dullness on percussion, No crackles
Abormal: Rhonchi, Wheezes, Shortness of breath

Normal: Normal heart sounds, No peripheral edema, Normal pulse, No murmurs, gallops, rubs, No carotid bruit, No DVT
Abormal: Irregular rhythm, Tachycardia, Bradycardia

Normal: Non-tender, Non-distended, No splenomegaly, Stool heme negative, No hepatosplenomegaly
Abormal: Diminished or absent bowel sounds, Hepatomegaly, Rectal mass

Normal: No cervical lesions, Non-tender adnexae
Abormal: Labial lesions present, Cervical discharge present, Uterine mass found

Normal: C-spine point tenderness absent, L-spine point tenderness absent, No clubbing, cyanosis, No point tenderness, Normal ROM, Normal cranial nerves, reflexes, sensation
Abormal: T-spine tenderness, Decreased muscle strength, Osteoarthritis

Normal: Alert and oriented, Ambulates without difficulty, DTRs 2+ throughout
Abormal: Aphasic, Cranial nerve testing abnormal, Positive Romberg

Normal: No depression, No suicidal ideation, No delusions
Abormal: Anxious, Auditory or visual hallucinations, Paranoid ideation
